name: Suspicious Shuffle: Free For All
description:
This is the free version of Suspicious Shuffle, it's the full game with no features held back, drag your friends in for a romping good time! Imagine if Mario Party was Co-Op, or if you're kinda old (feels bad man): Pyramid Escape from Warcraft 3.

Mario Party meets Geometry Wars in this minigame adventure for 1-6 players!


Play through a 1-6 player co-op campaign (approx. 4-5 hours) utilizing a diverse set of skills in a ever-Shuffling 29 minigame fiesta! In the process, enjoy a light-hearted story involving the Suspicious Dealer and restoring balance to the universe. The stakes have never been lower!


Is an adventure really complete without hats? Clearing the campaign rewards you with priceless Stars which can be used to unlock customisation options and get fancy!


Sometimes we all need a break from helping one other to show off and find out who really is the very best. It'll be you, obviously. Prove it over 18 PvP minigames.


Mix and match your favorite minigames with modifiable settings to play them the way you like them, no judgement.
